verses.roman:
ei aparādha tumi nā la-iha āmāra
tomāra adhīna āmi--putra se tomāra

synonyms: ei aparādha—this offense; tumi—you; nā—do not; la-iha—take; āmāra—of Me; tomāra—your; adhīna—dependent; āmi—I; putra—son; se—that; tomāra—of you.
translation: "Mother, please do not take this as an offense, for I, your son, am completely dependent upon you.
